DEFAULT.questionTitle: Can I change which account my money is redeemed to?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
Your money is redeemed to your primary bank account. You can easily change the primary bank account whenever you want to. 

You can see your banks by pressing the 'BANK DETAILS' button below. 

Here's how to change your primary bank account:

1) Tapping on the three dots next to the bank name
2) Tap on 'Make Primary'
DEFAULT.feedback: change bank account, change redeem bank, get money in different bank account, how to change

DEFAULT.questionTitle: Can I invest using a credit/debit card?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
No, it is not possible to invest using credit/debit card on Groww.
SEBI rules say the investments should be made through verified bank accounts only. It is not possible to verify bank accounts when investments are made using a credit/debit card.
You can use the following options:
1. UPI apps (Google Pay, PhonePe, BHIM, etc) 2. Net banking 3. NEFT/RTGS/IMPS

DEFAULT.questionTitle: How to add a bank account to Groww?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
You can do so by clicking the 'BANK DETAILS' button below.;
Then, tap on 'Add Another Bank' to add a new bank account.
If you already have another bank account added, you make it your primary account. Here's how to:
1) Tapping on the three dots next to the bank name2) Tap on 'Make Primary'
DEFAULT.feedback: update bank, new bank, adding bank

DEFAULT.questionTitle: How to change the primary bank account?
DEFAULT.answerHtml:
You can do so by clicking the 'BANK DETAILS' button below. 

Then, tap on 'Add Another Bank' to add a new bank account.

If you already have another bank account added, you make it your primary account. Here's how to:

1) Tapping on the three dots next to the bank name
2) Tap on 'Make Primary'

DEFAULT.questionTitle: My issue is not listed here.
DEFAULT.answerText: You can try searching for your issue. Alternatively you can raise a ticket with us. Our Customer Support champs will help you out in no time!

DEFAULT.questionTitle: Why do I need to add a bank account?
DEFAULT.answerHtml: Without adding a bank account, it is not possible to invest. As per government rules, money invested in mutual funds should be linked to a bank account so that it can be withdrawn and paid back.
DEFAULT.feedback: bank, savings bank, balance, account, savings bank, balance, join, link
